div1.p: Connor describes the yellow fever situation in Mexico.

div1.head: Letter from Michael E. Connor to Henry Rose Carter, January 28, 1922
div1.opener:
PODER EJECUTIVO FEDERAL
MEXICO
DEPARTAMENTO
DE
SALUBRIDAD PUBLICA DE MEXICO
JEFATURA DE LA CAMPAÑA CONTRA LA FIEBRE
AMARILLA EN LA ZONA DE TAMPICO
Bork
APARTADO 1170
RIVERA 16
Tampico, Tamps., Jan 28-22
Connor
My dear Doctor Carter
div1.p:
Your letter of Jan 16- just came
to hand, because I have been out in the field
a part of the past week and a part of the time
in Mexico city conferring with Dr. White.

The article that Dr. Russell
refers is a preliminary report on Merida and
only contains the suggestions that Yucatan
might be the home of YF. It was on
this suggestion that Spinden wrote his
article and I am glad he did because it
will focus attention on the question.

I expect to return to Yucatan
in March and if this will not delay you,
I will personally see Martinez and have
him go over the points you mention.
Why not send a copy of your letter to me
to Dr. Spinden. He is a very broad minded
man and is anxious to get to the bottom
of facts. His address is Harvard University,
Cambridge Mass or Museum Natural
History, New York city

I appreciate your remarks
regarding the use of fish and naturally
PODER EJECUTIVO FEDERAL
MEXICO
DEPARTAMENTO
DE
SALUBRIDAD PUBLICA DE MEXICO
JEFATURA DE LA CAMPAÑA CONTRA LA FIEBRE
AMARILLA EN LA ZONA DE TAMPICO
2
APARTADO 1170
RIVERA 16
Tampico, Tamps.,
feel good in the fact that
my resourcefulness has may
contribute a little in eradicating
the Y.F.

You will be interested to know
that the outlook here is promising and
we have more than a reasonable hope
that the condition here will be controlled
this year. After the focus in Merida, it now
seems that there may be extensive [unclear]
endemic centers in the state of Vera Cruz,
and the campaign is now being shaped
with that fact in mind.

Dr. Rose tells me that the
African expedition may be ready to start
this year, this was before Cross's death.

With sincere good wishes to Miss Carter
and the kindest personal regards
to yourself I am,
div1.closer:
as ever, your friend M.E.Connor The Merida report
will come out in
March number of
American Public Health
